title: FIRE MONSTERS AGAINST THE SON OF HERCULES-1962

sources.title: FIRE MONSTERS AGAINST THE SON OF HERCULES-1962
sources.description: Reedited US TV version of the italian sword and sandals "Maciste contro i mostri" (1962) byGuido Malatesta starring Reg Lewis and Margaret Lee. The 90 minutes original running time has been considerably shortened down to less than 10 minutes, amazingly enough.You get a chance to see the "fire monsters" in question, of course. Sorry for the Pan and scan format too. Watch for a longer version. more info on http://www.imdb.com/title/tt0057270/
